list.name: flight_id
list.query: SELECT flight_id FROM baggage.flight_kpis WHERE dep_time BETWEEN now() AND now() + INTERVAL 6 HOUR ORDER BY dep_time LIMIT 50

panels.title: Flights in Next 6 Hours (by missing bags)

targets.query: SELECT flight_id, formatDateTime(dep_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%M') AS dep_time, loaded_pct, missing_bags, freshness_sec FROM baggage.flight_kpis WHERE dep_time BETWEEN now() AND now() + INTERVAL 6 HOUR ORDER BY missing_bags DESC, loaded_pct ASC LIMIT 100
SELECT updated_at AS time, loaded_pct FROM baggage.flight_kpis WHERE flight_id='${flight_id}' ORDER BY updated_at
SELECT event_type, count() AS bags FROM baggage.bag_latest WHERE flight_id='${flight_id}' GROUP BY event_type ORDER BY bags DESC
